mdRecord.dcterms:title: Hardy C. Dillard, Law School Class of 1927, fourth Dean of the School of Law [1963-1968], receives special citation
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Thompson, Ralph R. [photographer]
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Hardy C. Dillard (right), dean of the University of Virginia's Law School, Thursday (6/17) receives a citation from Murray Comarow, assistant general counsel in the office of the Secretary of the Air Force, for his "outstanding service" as a member of the special advisory committee on the Air Force Academy (Information Service, University of Virginia). [original]
